Climate1_Bubble.2: Turn the globe or zoom with two fingers.
Climate1_Bubble.3: Click on a country to see its relative temperature change over the years.
Climate1_Bubble.4: To describe relative temperature changes, the averages of national or global temperatures are compared with the average temperature of the years 1950 - 81.

Climate1_Button.2: Was bedeutet das für die Schweiz?

Climate2_Bubble_Snowline.1: The freezing level shifts ever higher and less snow remains in lower areas.
Climate2_Bubble_Snowline.2: What was the freezing level in 2018?
Climate2_Bubble_Snowline.4: The zero degree line has risen 350 meters in the last 60 years -
Climate2_Bubble_Snowline.5: per degree of warming about 200 meters. Also the glaciers are affected, learn more!

Climate2_Bubble_Glacier.2: Um wieviel ist der Gletscher im Jahr 2019 seit 1850 zurückgegeangen?
